mapper.select: select * from examination where department_id = #{departmentId} and status = 4 and date_format(gmt_create,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{dateStr}
mapper.update: update examination set status = #{status} where id = #{collectionId} and project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.select: select id from examination order by id desc limit 1
select i.id as collectionId, creator_role_id as applicantRoleId from examination i where case_id = #{caseId} limit 1

select distinct i.project_id, p.project_name, i.department_id, d.name as department_name, i.status, i.goal, i.result_description, i.result_image, i.advice, i.result_description from examination i, examination_project p, department d where i.id = #{collectionId} and p.collection_id = i.id and p.project_id = i.project_id and d.id = i.department_id
